name: zenith-focus-timer
description: A minimalist timer app to help you focus, breathe, and relax. Features customizable durations and optional chime sounds for a serene experience.

scripts.build: if not exist dist mkdir dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --jsx=automatic --format=esm --platform=browser && copy index.html dist\ && copy manifest.json dist\ && copy metadata.json dist\ && copy icon-192x192.png dist\ && copy icon-512x512.png dist\
